name: Astra
description: Astra is a decentralized exchange developed in-house on the AirDAO ecosystem. Astra was conceptualized as part of AirDAOâ€™s vision to create a holistic DeFi ecosystem easy for any Web 2 user to use. Launched simultaneuosly with other foundational products, Astra addresses the challenges of liquidity and accessibility on AirDAO, built to make decentralized trading straightforward and accessible, helping people take advantage of the benefits of blockchain technology without unnecessary complexity. It is a platform that will support ALL AirDAO ecosystem tokens going forward, and will be foundational for any product built on AirDAO moving forward.
